translations.inf_about_me_about_1: Nice to meet you, my name is Mateusz Bonar and I am a junior front-end developer. My interests are technologies focused on the front-end part of the application, although I am not afraid of challenges in the face of new technologies. My professional goals are to develop and deepening skills in the IT industry because the constantly changing technology requires constant expansion of your knowledge.
translations.inf_about_me_about_2: I am also a person who loves meeting new people. In my spare time I am interested in music, militaries and games
translations.inf_banner_text_1: A man not afraid of challenges
translations.inf_contact_description: ,,Work will fill a large part of your life. The only way to be truly satisfied with your job is to do what you believe in. And the only way to do great for you is to love what you do ''
translations.inf_skills_main_subheader: As well as the tools I'm interested in
translations.inf_skills_text: Below you can see the technologies I know and which I use
translations.inf_skills_1_text: What would running a project be without a version control system. You don't have to worry, I'm not afraid of merge or commit :)
translations.inf_skills_2_text: React is a library that I especially like, if you want to see my code please go to github
translations.inf_skills_3_text: What would a web developer work be without JavaSciptu: D
translations.inf_skills_4_text: JavaScript can be better? Of course! Let's add typing, for sure the quality of the code will be better: D
translations.inf_skills_5_text: It would be hard to be a web developer without HTML5 knowledge, right?
translations.inf_skills_6_text: I would just add CSS3 to my project, make it more convenient, that's why I prefer SASS or LESS: D preprocessors
